English Sentences: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eesuwan hananau bessiyaabaa ba ashkkarata bessana mala, Xoossai Yesuus Kiristtoosayyo immido ajjuutai hagaa; Yesuusi ba kiitanchchaa kiittidi, ha ajjuutaa ba ashkkaraa Yohaannisa erissiis.

English Sentences: Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi Xoossaa qaalaa, Yesuus Kiristtoosa markkatettaanne ba be7ido ubbabaa markkattiis.

English Sentences: Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha maxaafaa nabbabiya urai anjjettidaagaa; qassi ha hananabaa yootiya qaalaa siyiyaageetinne ha maxaafan xaafettidaagaa naagiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta; aissi giikko, wodee matattiis.

English Sentences: John to the seven churches which are in Asia: Grace be unto you, and peace, from him which is, and which was, and which is to come; and from the seven Spirits which are before his throne;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Yohaannisi, Isiyaa biittan de7iya laappun woosa keettatuyyo yaagais; kase de7iya Xoossaappe, ha77ikka de7iya Xoossaappe, sinttappekka yaana Xoossaappe, qassi a kawotaa araataa sinttan de7iya laappun ayyaanatuppe, aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido.

English Sentences: And from Jesus Christ, who is the faithful witness, and the first begotten of the dead, and the prince of the kings of the earth. Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi haiquwaappe koiro denddida Na7aappe, sa7aa kawota haariya ammanettida markkaappe, Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido. I nuna siiqeesinne qassi nu nagaraa ailletettaappekka ba suuttan nuna kessiis.

English Sentences: And hath made us kings and priests unto God and his Father; to him be glory and dominion for ever and ever. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ba Xoossaayyoonne Aawaayyo oottana mala, i nuna kawotettanne qeeseta oottiis; ayyo merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi bonchchoinne wolqqai gido. Amin77i.

English Sentences: Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him, and they also which pierced him: and all kindreds of the earth shall wail because of him. Even so, Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, Yesuusi shaaraara yees. Asai ubbai, harai atto, a caddidaageetikka a be7ana; sa7an de7iya asai ubbai appe zilaalana. Hegee tuma. Amin77i.

English Sentences: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the ending, saith the Lord, which is, and which was, and which is to come, the Almighty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase de7iyaagee, ha77ikka de7iyaagee, sinttappekka yaana Godai, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossai, "Alifainne Omeegai tana" yaagees.

English Sentences: I John, who also am your brother, and companion in tribulation, and in the kingdom and patience of Jesus Christ, was in the isle that is called Patmos, for the word of God, and for the testimony of Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Yohaannisi, intte ishai, inttenaara Yesuus Kiristtoosa waayiyaanne a kawotettaa qassi a danddayaa issippe shaakkiyaagee, Xoossaa qaalaa yootido gishshaunne Yesuusabaa markkattido gishshau, Paaximo giyo haruuruwan de7aas.

English Sentences: I was in the Spirit on the Lord's day, and heard behind me a great voice, as of a trumpet,
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa gallassan taani Geeshsha Ayyaanan ohettaas; taani taappe guyyeera malkkata waasuwaa mala gita cenggurssaa siyaas.

English Sentences: Saying, I am Alpha and Omega, the first and the last: and, What thou seest, write in a book, and send it unto the seven churches which are in Asia; unto Ephesus, and unto Smyrna, and unto Pergamos, and unto Thyatira, and unto Sardis, and unto Philadelphia, and unto Laodicea.
Wolaitta Sentences: He cenggurssai tana, "Neeni be7iyoogaa maxaafan xaafa; xaafada Isiyan de7iya laappun woosa keettatuyyo, Efisoona, Samirnneesa, PHerggaamoona, Tiyaaxiroona, Sarddeesa, Pilaadelifiyaa, Lodooqiyaa woosa keettatuyyo yedda" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I turned to see the voice that spake with me. And being turned, I saw seven golden candlesticks;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani taayyo yootiya cenggurssaa be7anau guyye simmaas; simmada xomppiyaa wottiyo laappun worqqa ballata be7aas.

English Sentences: And in the midst of the seven candlesticks one like unto the Son of man, clothed with a garment down to the foot, and girt about the paps with a golden girdle.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ballatu giddon Asa Na7a milatiyaagaa be7aas; adussa afalaa ba tohuwaa gatti maayidi, worqqa danccuwan ba tiraa yuushshi aattidi qachchiis.

English Sentences: His head and his hairs were white like wool, as white as snow; and his eyes were as a flame of fire;
Wolaitta Sentences: A huupheenne a huuphiyaa binnaanai bootta dorssa ikisenne shachcha milatees; a aifeekka tama laco milatees.

English Sentences: And his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace; and his voice as the sound of many waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: A tohoikka coociyaa taman seeridi phooliya nahaase giyo birataa milatees; a cenggurssaikka gita shaafaa gunttaa mala.

English Sentences: And he had in his right hand seven stars: and out of his mouth went a sharp twoedged sword: and his countenance was as the sun shineth in his strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba ushachcha kushiyan laappun xoolintteta oiqqiis. A doonaappe naa77u baggaara qarattida bisoi kiyiis. A som77oikka wolqqappe poo7iya awa aifiyaa milatees.

English Sentences: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a be7ido wode haiqqidabaadan hanada, a tohuwaa matan kunddaas. Kunddin ba ushachcha kushiyaa ta bolli wottidi, tana hagaadan yaagiis; "Yayyoppa; koiroikka wurssettaikka tana.

English Sentences: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore, Amen; and have the keys of hell and of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani paxa de7iyaagaa. Taani haiqqaas; shin be7a, meri merinaukka paxa de7ais. Haiquwaa qulppeenne Si7ooliyaa qulppee ta kushiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: Write the things which thou hast seen, and the things which are, and the things which shall be hereafter;
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi neeni be7idobaanne ha77i de7iyaabaa, qassi sinttappe hananabaa xaafa.

English Sentences: The mystery of the seven stars which thou sawest in my right hand, and the seven golden candlesticks. The seven stars are the angels of the seven churches: and the seven candlesticks which thou sawest are the seven churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta ushachcha kushiyan be7ido laappun xoolinttetu birshshettainne qassi xomppeta wottiyo laappun worqqa ballatu birshshettai hagaa; laappun xoolintteti laappun woosa keettatu kiitanchchata; laappun worqqa ballati laappun woosa keettata.

English Sentences: Unto the angel of the church of Ephesus write; These things saith he that holdeth the seven stars in his right hand, who walketh in the midst of the seven golden candlesticks;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Efisoonan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Ba ushachcha kushiyan laappun xoolinttiyaa oiqqidaagee, xomppeta wottiyo laappun worqqa ballatu gidduwaara hemettiyaagee, hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works, and thy labour, and thy patience, and how thou canst not bear them which are evil: and thou hast tried them which say they are apostles, and are not, and hast found them liars:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ne oosuwaa, ne daafuraanne ne genccaa erais. Qassi neeni iita asatubaa genccanau danddayabeennaagaakka taani erais; Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta gidennan de7iiddi banttana, Nuuni Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta giyaageeta neeni xomoosada, eti worddanchcha gidiyoogaa demmidoogaakka erais.

English Sentences: And hast borne, and hast patience, and for my name's sake hast laboured, and hast not fainted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni genccadasa; qassi ta sunttaa gishshaukka metuwaa danddayadasa; daafurabaakka.

English Sentences: Nevertheless I have somewhat against thee, because thou hast left thy first love.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani nena boriyoobi de7ees; aissi giikko, neeni kase ne siiquwaa aggadasa.

English Sentences: Remember therefore from whence thou art fallen, and repent, and do the first works; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will remove thy candlestick out of his place, except thou repent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi neeni awappe kunddidaakkonne akeeka. Ne nagaraappe simma; neeni kase oottiyo oosuwaa ootta. Hegee xayikko, taani neekko yaana; yaada neeni ne nagaraappe simmana xayikko, neeni xomppiyaa wottiyo ne ballaa a sohuwaappe ekkarggana.

English Sentences: But this thou hast, that thou hatest the deeds of the Nicolaitanes, which I also hate.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issibaa loittadasa; Niiqoolaawetu oosuwaa, taani ixxiyoogaa neenikka ixxadasa.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the midst of the paradise of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo; taani xooniya uraayyo Xoossaa gannatiyan mokkiya de7o mittaa aifiyaappe maanau immana" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And unto the angel of the church in Smyrna write; These things saith the first and the last, which was dead, and is alive;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Samirnneesan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Haiqqidaagee, haiquwaappekka denddidaagee, koiroogeenne wurssettaagee hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works, and tribulation, and poverty, (but thou art rich) and I know the blasphemy of them which say they are Jews, and are not, but are the synagogue of Satan.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani ne waayiyaanne ne hiyyeesatettaa erais; shin neeni dure. Aihuda gidennan de7iiddi banttana, Nuuni Aihuda giyaageeti cayiyo cashshaa taani erais; shin eti Seexaanaa maabaran de7oosona.

English Sentences: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni waayettana waayiyau yayyoppa. Be7a, xalahe halaqai intteppe amaridaageeta xomoosanau qasho keettan yeggana; tammu gallassa gakkanaassi intte waayettana. Haiqqana gakkanaassikka ammanettidaagaa gida; taani neeyyo de7o akiliiliyaa immana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; He that overcometh shall not be hurt of the second death.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo; xooniya urai naa77antto haiquwan qohettenna" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And to the angel of the church in Pergamos write; These things saith he which hath the sharp sword with two edges;
Wolaitta Sentences: "PHerggaamoonan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Naa77u baggaara qarattida bisoi de7iyoogee hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works, and where thou dwellest, even where Satan's seat is: and thou holdest fast my name, and hast not denied my faith, even in those days wherein Antipas was my faithful martyr, who was slain among you, where Satan dwelleth.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani neeni de7iyoosaa erais. Neeni Seexaanaa kawotaa araatai de7iyoosan de7aasa; ta sunttaa mintta naagaasa. Harai atto, Seexaanai de7iyoosan intte matan asi worddo taani ammaniyo markkai Anttiphaasi de7iyo wodekka tana ammaniyoogaa aggabaakka.

English Sentences: But I have a few things against thee, because thou hast there them that hold the doctrine of Balaam, who taught Balac to cast a stumblingblock before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed unto idols, and to commit fornication.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani nena boriyo guuttabai de7ees; Israa7eela asai eeqau yarshshido qumaa maanaadaaninne ziittanaadan eta nagara ootissida Baalaaqa tamaarissida Balaama timirttiyaa tamaariya amarida asati nenaara de7oosona.

English Sentences: So hast thou also them that hold the doctrine of the Nicolaitanes, which thing I hate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qassi Niiqoolaawetu timirttiyaa tamaariya asati nenaara de7oosona.

English Sentences: Repent; or else I will come unto thee quickly, and will fight against them with the sword of my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni ne nagaraappe simma; hegee xayikko, taani neekko eesuwan yaana; yaada he asatuura ta doonaappe kiyiya bisuwan olettana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo. Xooniya urau taani geeman de7iya mannaappe amaridaagaa immana. Qassi taani bootta shuchchaakka ayyo immana; ekkiya uraappe attin, ooninne erenna ooratta sunttai he shuchchaa bolli xaafetti uttiis" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tiyaaxiroonan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Xoossaa Na7ai, tamaa lacuwaa milatiya aifee de7iyoogee, qassi coociyaa taman seeridi phooliya nahaase giyo birataa milatiya tohoi de7iyoogee, hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works, and charity, and service, and faith, and thy patience, and thy works; and the last to be more than the first.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani ne oosuwaa, ne siiquwaa, ne ammanuwaa, ne maaduwaanne ne genccaa erais; neeni koiro oottiyoogaappe ha77i darissada oottiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding I have a few things against thee, because thou sufferest that woman Jezebel, which calleth herself a prophetess, to teach and to seduce my servants to commit fornication, and to eat things sacrificed unto idols.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani nena boriyoobi de7ees; bana, Taani hananabaa yootiyaaro yaagiya maccaasiyo Elzzaabeelo ainne gaakka; he maccaasiyaa ta ashkkarati ziittanaadaaninne eeqau yarshshido qumaa maanaadan, tamaarissausunne balettausu.

English Sentences: And I gave her space to repent of her fornication; and she repented not.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ba nagaraappe simmana mala, taani o xeella be7aas; shin shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogaappe a simmanau koyabeikku.

English Sentences: Behold, I will cast her into a bed, and them that commit adultery with her into great tribulation, except they repent of their deeds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7ite, taani o hiixan onggin, sahuwan a waayettana. Iira shaaramuxiyaageeti he iira oottiyo nagaraappe simmana xayikko, etakka hanttaara waayiyan yeggana.

English Sentences: And I will kill her children with death; and all the churches shall know that I am he which searcheth the reins and hearts: and I will give unto every one of you according to your works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani i naatakka worana; qassi woosa keetta ubbaikka taani asa qofanne amo eriyaagaa gidiyoogaa erana; taani intteyyo intte oosuwaa malaa immana.

English Sentences: But unto you I say, and unto the rest in Thyatira, as many as have not this doctrine, and which have not known the depths of Satan, as they speak; I will put upon you none other burden.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""SHin Tiyaaxiroonan de7iya haratoo, ha iita timirttiyaa tamaaribeennaageetoo, harati, Seexaanaa ciimma yohuwaa giyoogaa intte tamaaribeekketa; taani inttena hara deexo toossikke gais.

English Sentences: But that which ye have already hold fast till I come.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani yaana gakkanaassi intteyyo de7iyaabaa mintti naagite.

English Sentences: And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoonidaagaayyoonne wurssettai gakkanaassi ta oosuwaa naagidaagaayyo, asa zare ubbaa haarana mala, taani ta Aawaappe ekkido maataa malaa ayyo immana;

English Sentences: And he shall rule them with a rod of iron; as the vessels of a potter shall they be broken to shivers: even as I received of my Father.
Wolaitta Sentences: i eta birata dullan haarananne urqqa miishsha menttiyoogaadan menttana.

English Sentences: And I will give him the morning star.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani ayyo bakkaaliyaa xoolinttiyaa immana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And unto the angel of the church in Sardis write; These things saith he that hath the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars; I know thy works, that thou hast a name that thou livest, and art dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sarddeesan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Xoossaa ayyaana laappunatinne laappun xoolintteti de7iyoogee hagaadan gees. "Taani ne oosuwaa erais; asi nena paxa de7aasa giikkokka, neeni haiqqadasa.

English Sentences: Be watchful, and strengthen the things which remain, that are ready to die: for I have not found thy works perfect before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beegotta! Attidabaanne haiqqanau matidabaa minttetta. Aissi giikko, ne oosoi ta Xoossaa sinttan polo gidennaagaa taani demmaas.

English Sentences: Remember therefore how thou hast received and heard, and hold fast, and repent. If therefore thou shalt not watch, I will come on thee as a thief, and thou shalt not know what hour I will come upon thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi neeni ekkidobaanne siyidobaa akeeka; naaga; ne nagaraappekka simma. Neeni beegottennabaa gidikko, taani neekko kaisodan yaana; taani woisaade yaanaakkonne neeni erakka.

English Sentences: Thou hast a few names even in Sardis which have not defiled their garments; and they shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin bantta maayuwaa urqqayibeenna amarida asati Sarddeesan nenaara de7oosona. Eti bootta maayuwaa maayidi tanaara hemettana; aissi giikko, eti bootta maayuwaa maayanau bessiyaageeta.

English Sentences: He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoonidaagee hegaadankka bootta maayuwaa maayana. Taani a sunttaa de7o maxaafaappe quccikke; taani ta Aawaa sinttaaninne a kiitanchchatu sinttan i tabaa gidiyoogaa markkattana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Pilaadelifiyan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Daawita qulppiyaa oiqqidaagee, ooninne gorddanau danddayennaadan dooyiyaagee, qassi ooninne dooyanau danddayennaadan gorddiyaagee geeshshai, tumanchchai hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani ne oosuwaa erais. Be7a, taani ne sinttan ooninne gorddanau danddayenna dooya penggiyaa wottaas; aissi giikko, ne wolqqai guutta gidikkokka, ta qaalaa naagadasanne ta sunttaakka erikke gabaakka.

English Sentences: Behold, I will make them of the synagogue of Satan, which say they are Jews, and are not, but do lie; behold, I will make them to come and worship before thy feet, and to know that I have loved thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a, Aihuda gidokkona shin banttana, Nuuni Aihuda giidi worddotiya Seexaana Aihuda woosa keettata taani ehaada, ne sinttan goinissananne nena siiqiyoogaakka eta erissana.

English Sentences: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni genccanau ta azazuwaa naagido gishshau, sa7an de7iya asaa paaccanau kumetta sa7aa bolli yiya waaye wodiyaappe taanikka nena naagana.

English Sentences: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown. v
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eesuwan yaana; ooninne ne akiliiliyaa ekkenna mala, neeyyo de7iyaabaa mintta oiqqa.

English Sentences: Him that overcometh will I make a pillar in the temple of my God, and he shall go no more out: and I will write upon him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, which is new Jerusalem, which cometh down out of heaven from my God: and I will write upon him my new name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xooniya uraa ta Aawaa Beeta Maqidasiyan tuussa oottana; i hegaappe mulekka kiyenna. Taani ta Xoossaa sunttaa, ta Xoossaa katamaa sunttaanne ta Xoossaa matappe wodhdhana ooratta Yerusalaame sunttaa a bolli xaafana. Qassi taani ta ooratta sunttaakka a bolli xaafana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo" yaagees yaagada xaafa.

English Sentences: And unto the angel of the church of the Laodiceans write; These things saith the Amen, the faithful and true witness, the beginning of the creation of God;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Lodooqiyan de7iya woosa keettaa kiitanchchaayyo hagaadan yaagada xaafa; Ammanettida tumanchcha markkai, Xoossai medhdhidobau koiroi, "Amin77i" giyoogee hagaadan yaagees.

English Sentences: I know thy works, that thou art neither cold nor hot: I would thou wert cold or hot.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Taani ne oosuwaa erais. Neeni irxxa gidakka; woi misho gidakka; irxxa woi misho gidarkkiishsha.

English Sentences: So then because thou art lukewarm, and neither cold nor hot, I will spue thee out of my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni irxxa woi misho gidennan, bol77o gidiyo gishshau, taani nena ta doonaappe cuchchana hanais.

English Sentences: Because thou sayest, I am rich, and increased with goods, and have need of nothing; and knowest not that thou art wretched, and miserable, and poor, and blind, and naked:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko neeni, Taani dure; mehiyaasa; tana ainne koshshenna yaagaasa. SHin neeni metootiya asa, qarettiya asa, hiyyeesa, qooqenne kallottida asa gidiyoogaa erakka.

English Sentences: I counsel thee to buy of me gold tried in the fire, that thou mayest be rich; and white raiment, that thou mayest be clothed, and that the shame of thy nakedness do not appear; and anoint thine eyes with eyesalve, that thou mayest see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, neeni duretana mala, taman geeyida worqqaa, nena yeellayiya ne kalluwaa kammanau bootta maayuwaanne qassi loitta xeellanau ne aifiyaa tiyiyo xaliyaa taappe shammanaadan, taani nena zorais.

English Sentences: As many as I love, I rebuke and chasten: be zealous therefore, and repent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani siiqiyo ubbaa seeraisinne qaxxayais; simmi keehi mishetta; ne nagaraappekka simma.

English Sentences: Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him, and will sup with him, and he with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Be7a, taani karen eqqada xeesais. Ooninne taani xeesiyoogaa siyidi, kariyaa dooyikko, taani akko gelana; gelada aara issippe kahuwaa maana; ikka tanaara issippe maana.

English Sentences: To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani xoonada ta Aawaara a kawotaa araatan uttidoogaadan, xoonida urau tanaara ta kawotaa araatan uttiyo alaafetettaa immana.

English Sentences: He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: ""Siyiyo haitti de7iyo urai Geeshsha Ayyaanai woosa keettatuyyo giyoobaa siyo" yaagees yaagada xaafa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: After this I looked, and, behold, a door was opened in heaven: and the first voice which I heard was as it were of a trumpet talking with me; which said, Come up hither, and I will shew thee things which must be hereafter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani saluwan dooya penggiyaa be7aas; qassi taayyo malkkatadan yootishin, taani siyido koiro cenggurssai tana; "Hagaappe guyyiyan, hananau bessiyaabaa taani nena bessana; haa kiya" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and one sat on the throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaarakka taani Geeshsha Ayyaanan ohetta aggaas. Be7ite, saluwan kawotaa araatai de7ees; he araatan issoi uttiis.

English Sentences: And he that sat was to look upon like a jasper and a sardine stone: and there was a rainbow round about the throne, in sight like unto an emerald.
Wolaitta Sentences: He uttidaagaa merai burccukko milatiya al77o shuchchaadaaninne zo7o al77o shuchchaadan phoolees. Kawotaa araataayyo ubba baggaara mitta haitta milatiya zuullai yuuyi aadhdhidi de7ees.

English Sentences: And round about the throne were four and twenty seats: and upon the seats I saw four and twenty elders sitting, clothed in white raiment; and they had on their heads crowns of gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawotaa araataa yuuyi aadhdhidi, hara laatamanne oiddu kawotaa araatati de7oosona; etan bootta maayuwaa maayidi, huuphiyan worqqa akiliiliyaa wottida laatamanne oiddu cimati uttidosona.

English Sentences: And out of the throne proceeded lightnings and thunderings and voices: and there were seven lamps of fire burning before the throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotaa araataappe wolqqanttai, kooshinchchainne dadaa gunttai kiyees; qassi kawotaa araataa sinttan laappun xomppeti poo7oosona. Hegeeti Xoossaa laappun a yyaanata.

English Sentences: And before the throne there was a sea of glass like unto crystal: and in the midst of the throne, and round about the throne, were four beasts full of eyes before and behind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotaa araataa sinttan birille misatiya burccukko abbai de7ees. He kawotaa araataappe sinttaaranne guyyeera a matan yuuyi aadhdhidi, aifee kumido oiddu paxa de7iya meretati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And the first beast was like a lion, and the second beast like a calf, and the third beast had a face as a man, and the fourth beast was like a flying eagle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro paxa de7iya meretai gaammo milatees; naa77anttoi miiza mara milatees; heezzanttuwaa som77oi asa som77o milatees; qassi oiddanttoi paalliya arggantta milatees.

English Sentences: And the four beasts had each of them six wings about him; and they were full of eyes within: and they rest not day and night, saying, Holy, holy, holy, LORD God Almighty, which was, and is, and is to come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddu paxa de7iya meretatuyyo huuphiyan huuphiyan usuppun qefee de7ees; etau bollan garssankka ubbasan aifee kumiis. Eti qamminne gallassi, "Geeshshau, geeshshau, geeshshau, kase de7iyaagoo, ha77ikka de7iyaagoo, qassi sinttappe yaanaagoo, Godau, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossau" giyoogaa aggokkona.

English Sentences: And when those beasts give glory and honour and thanks to him that sat on the throne, who liveth for ever and ever,
Wolaitta Sentences: He meretati kawotaa araatan uttida meri merinau paxa de7iyaagaa mazamuriyan sabbido wode, bonchchido wodenne galatido wode,

English Sentences: The four and twenty elders fall down before him that sat on the throne, and worship him that liveth for ever and ever, and cast their crowns before the throne, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: 0laatamanne oiddu cimati kawotaa araatan uttida meri merinau de7iyaagaa sinttan gufannidi, ayyo goinnoosona; bantta akiliiliyaa kawotaa araataa sinttan wottidi hagaadan yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nu Godau Xoossau, neeni bonchchuwaa, sabaanne wolqqaa ekkanau bessaasa. Aissi giikko, ubbabaa neeni medhdhadasa; qassi ubbabaikka neeni koyidoogaadan haniisinne de7iis" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: And I saw in the right hand of him that sat on the throne a book written within and on the backside, sealed with seven seals.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi xaatta woraqatai kawotaa araatan uttidaagau ushachcha kushiyan de7iyaagaa be7aas; he xaatta woraqatai naa77u baggaarakka xaafetti uttiis; qassi laappun maatafai a bolli attamettiis.

English Sentences: And I saw a strong angel proclaiming with a loud voice, Who is worthy to open the book, and to loose the seals thereof?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani issi wolqqaama kiitanchchai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Maatafaa peeridi, xaatta woraqataa birshshanau bessiyo urai oonee?" yaagidi, awaajjiyaagaa be7aas.

English Sentences: And no man in heaven, nor in earth, neither under the earth, was able to open the book, neither to look thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan gidin woi sa7an gidin, woi sa7aappe garssan gidin, he xaatta woraqataa birshshanau woi a gidduwaa xeellanau ooyyoonne danddayettibeenna.

English Sentences: And I wept much, because no man was found worthy to open and to read the book, neither to look thereon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaatta woraqataa birshshanau woi a gidduwaa xeellanau bessiyo urai bainna gishshau, taani daro yeekkaas.

English Sentences: And one of the elders saith unto me, Weep not: behold, the Lion of the tribe of Juda, the Root of David, hath prevailed to open the book, and to loose the seven seals thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cimatuppe issoi tana, "Yeekkoppa; be7a, Yihudaa zare gidiya gaammoi, Daawita zaree, maatafaa peeranaunne xaatta woraqataa birshshanau xooniis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I beheld, and, lo, in the midst of the throne and of the four beasts, and in the midst of the elders, stood a Lamb as it had been slain, having seven horns and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God sent forth into all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kawotaa araataappe, paxa de7iya oiddu meretatuppenne qassi cimatuppe gidduwan, shuhettida Dorssa milatidi eqqidaagaa be7aas; ayyo laappun kacetinne laappun aifeti de7oosona. Hegeeti sa7a ubbaa kiitettida Xoossaa laappun ayyaanata.

English Sentences: And he came and took the book out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Dorssai biidi, kawotaa araataa bolli uttidaagau ushachcha kushiyaappe xaatta woraqataa ekkiis.

English Sentences: And when he had taken the book, the four beasts and four and twenty elders fell down before the Lamb, having every one of them harps, and golden vials full of odours, which are the prayers of saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: I he xaatta woraqataa ekkido wode, paxa de7iya oiddu meretatinne laatamanne oiddu cimati a sinttan kunddidosona. Eti huuphiyan huuphiyan diittaanne ixaanai kumido worqqa miishshaa oiqqidosona. He ixaanai geeshshati Xoossaa woossiyoogaa.

English Sentences: And they sung a new song, saying, Thou art worthy to take the book, and to open the seals thereof: for thou wast slain, and hast redeemed us to God by thy blood out of every kindred, and tongue, and people, and nation;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Xaatta woraqataa ekkanaunne maatafaa peerada dooyanau neeyyo bessees. Aissi giikko, neeni shuhettadasa. Neeni qommo ubbaappe, dumma dumma biitta qaala ubbaappe, yara ubbaappenne zare ubbaappe ne suuttan Xoossaayyo asaa wozadasa.

English Sentences: And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu Xoossaayyo oottana mala, eta neeni kawotettanne qeeseta oottadasa. Qassi eti sa7an haarana" yaagidi ooratta mazamuriyaa yexxoosona.

English Sentences: And I beheld, and I heard the voice of many angels round about the throne and the beasts and the elders: and the number of them was ten thousand times ten thousand, and thousands of thousands;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani xeellada, kawotaa araataa, paxa de7iya oiddu meretatanne cimata yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqida daro kiitanchchatu cenggurssaa siyaas; eti sha7aaninne miilooniyan paidettoosona.

English Sentences: Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kiitanchchati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "SHuhettida Dorssai wolqqaa, duretettaa, aadhdhida eratettaa, minotettaa, bonchchuwaa, sabaa, galataa ekkanau bessees!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And every creature which is in heaven, and on the earth, and under the earth, and such as are in the sea, and all that are in them, heard I saying, Blessing, and honour, and glory, and power, be unto him that sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, sa7an, saluwan, sa7aappe garssaaninne abbaa giddon de7iya mereta ubbainne qassi hegeetun de7iya mereta ubbai, "Kawotaa araataa bolli uttidaagaayyoonne Dorssaayyo galatai, bonchchoi, sabainne wolqqai meri merinau gido!" yaagidi yexxishin siyaas.

English Sentences: And the four beasts said, Amen. And the four and twenty elders fell down and worshipped him that liveth for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paxa de7iya oiddu meretati, "Amin77i" yaagin, cimati gufannidi goinnidosona.

English Sentences: And I saw when the Lamb opened one of the seals, and I heard, as it were the noise of thunder, one of the four beasts saying, Come and see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai laappun maatafatuppe issuwaa dooyishin be7aas; qassi paxa de7iya oiddu meretatuppe issoi dadaa gunttaa milatiya cenggurssan, "Haa ya!" yaagishin, taani siyaas.

English Sentences: And I saw, and behold a white horse: and he that sat on him had a bow; and a crown was given unto him: and he went forth conquering, and to conquer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani issi bootta paraa be7aas. He paraa toggidaagee wonddafiyaa oiqqiis; qassi ayyo akiliilee imettiis. Olaa i xooniiddinne qassikka xoonanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when he had opened the second seal, I heard the second beast say, Come and see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai naa77antto maatafaa dooyido wode, paxa de7iya meretatuppe naa77anttoi, "Haa ya!" yaagishin, taani siyaas.

English Sentences: And there went out another horse that was red: and power was given to him that sat thereon to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another: and there was given unto him a great sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi hara daama parai kiyiis. Asai issoi issuwaara shuhettana mala, he paraa toggidaagaayyo sa7an olaa denttiyo wolqqai imettiis. Wogga bisoikka ayyo imettiis.

English Sentences: And when he had opened the third seal, I heard the third beast say, Come and see. And I beheld, and lo a black horse; and he that sat on him had a pair of balances in his hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai heezzantto maatafaa dooyido wode, paxa de7iya meretatuppe heezzanttoi, "Haa ya!" yaagishin, taani siyaas. Yaatada amara parai kiyidaagaa be7aas; qassi he paraa toggidaagee ba kushiyan meezaanaa oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And I heard a voice in the midst of the four beasts say, A measure of wheat for a penny, and three measures of barley for a penny; and see thou hurt not the oil and the wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani paxa de7iya oiddu meretatu giddoppe cenggurssa milatiyaabaa siyaas, He cenggurssai, "Issi gallassa oosuwaayyo damoozai issi guruure gistte; qassi issi gallassa oosuwaayyo damoozai heezzu guruure bangga. SHin zaitiyaanne woine eessaa qohoppa" yaagishin siyaas.

English Sentences: And when he had opened the fourth seal, I heard the voice of the fourth beast say, Come and see.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai oiddantto maatafaa dooyido wode, paxa de7iya meretatuppe oiddanttoi, "Haa ya!" yaagishin, taani siyaas.

English Sentences: And I looked, and behold a pale horse: and his name that sat on him was Death, and Hell followed with him. And power was given unto them over the fourth part of the earth, to kill with sword, and with hunger, and with death, and with the beasts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani washalaala parai kiyidaagaa be7aas. He paraa toggidaagaa sunttai Haiquwaa; a geeduwaa Si7oolee kaalliis. Haiqoinne Si7oolee sa7aappe oiddantto kushiyaa olan, koshan, harggiyan, do7an worissana mala, etau maatai imettiis.

English Sentences: And when he had opened the fifth seal, I saw under the altar the souls of them that were slain for the word of God, and for the testimony which they held:
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai ichchashantto maatafaa dooyido wode, eti Xoossaa qaalaa yootido gishshaunne bantta markkatettan ammanettido gishshau, shukkido asatu shemppuwaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaappe garssan be7aas.

English Sentences: And they cried with a loud voice, saying, How long, O Lord, holy and true, dost thou not judge and avenge our blood on them that dwell on the earth?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Ubbaa Haariya Godau, geeshshau, tumanchchau, sa7an de7iya asaa bolli aude pirdduutee? Qassi nu suuttaa aude achchuutee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And white robes were given unto every one of them; and it was said unto them, that they should rest yet for a little season, until their fellowservants also and their brethren, that should be killed as they were, should be fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo huuphiyan huuphiyan bootta maayoi imettiis. Etaagaadankka haiqqanau bessiya eta lagge ashkkaratu paidoinne eta ishanttu paidoi kumana gakkanaassi, eti amarida wodiyaa takkishshana mala, etayyo odettiis.

English Sentences: And I beheld when he had opened the sixth seal, and, lo, there was a great earthquake; and the sun became black as sackcloth of hair, and the moon became as blood;
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai usuppuntta maatafaa dooyido wode, taani be7aas; biittai wolqqappe qaaxxiis. Awa aifee karetta waaruwaadan karexxiis; aginaikka ubbaara suutta milatiis.

English Sentences: And the stars of heaven fell unto the earth, even as a fig tree casteth her untimely figs, when she is shaken of a mighty wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Balase giyo mittee qau7e aifee, wolqqaama carkkoi qaattin, sa7an qoqqofettiyoogaadan, xoolintteti saluwaappe sa7an qoqqofettidosona.

English Sentences: And the heaven departed as a scroll when it is rolled together; and every mountain and island were moved out of their places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloi xaatta woraqatai xaaxettiyoogaadan, xaaxettidi xayi bayiis; dere ubbatinne haruuro ubbati bantta sohuwaappe kichchi aggidosona.

English Sentences: And the kings of the earth, and the great men, and the rich men, and the chief captains, and the mighty men, and every bondman, and every free man, hid themselves in the dens and in the rocks of the mountains;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, sa7aa kawoti, deriyaa haariyaageeti, shaalaqati, dureti, wolqqaamati, qassi hara asai ubbai, ailleti, goqati deriyaa kiyidi, gonggolo giddooninne shuchchaa kooppuwan qosettidosona.

English Sentences: And said to the mountains and rocks, Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him that sitteth on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qosettidi deretanne shuchchaa, "Kawotaa araatan uttidaagaa aifiyaappenne Dorssaa hanqquwaappe nu bolli kunddidi, nuna gentterkketiishsha!

English Sentences: For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eta gita hanqquwaa gallassai gakkiichchiis; he hanqquwaa danddayanai oonee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And after these things I saw four angels standing on the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, that the wind should not blow on the earth, nor on the sea, nor on any tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani oiddu kiitanchchati oiddu sa7aa zooziyan eqqidaageeta be7aas. He kiitanchchati sa7aa bollan, woi abbaa bollan, woi ai mitta bollan, carkkoi carkkennaadan teqqidosona.

English Sentences: And I saw another angel ascending from the east, having the seal of the living God: and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka de7o Xoossaa maatafaa oiqqida hara kiitanchchai awai mokkiyoosaappe kiyiyaagaa taani be7aas. He kiitanchchai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, sa7aanne abbaa qohanau wolqqai imettido oiddu kiitanchchata xeesiis.

English Sentences: Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeesidi, "Nu Xoossaa ashkkaratu som77uwan nuuni maatafaa wottana gakkanaashin, sa7aa gidin woi abbaa gidin, woi mitta gidinkka qohoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I heard the number of them which were sealed: and there were sealed an hundred and forty and four thousand of all the tribes of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossaa maatafaa som77uwan wottidoogeetu paiduwaa siyaas. Israa7eela zare ubbaappe issi xeetanne oitamanne oiddu sha7aa som77uwan maatafai wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: Of the tribe of Juda were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Reuben were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Gad were sealed twelve thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa som77uwan maatafai wodhdhiis. Roobeela zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Gaada zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa,

English Sentences: Of the tribe of Aser were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Nephthalim were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Manasses were sealed twelve thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aseera zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Nifttaaleema zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Minaase zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa,

English Sentences: Of the tribe of Simeon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Levi were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Issachar were sealed twelve thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simoona zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Leewa zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Yisaakoora zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa,

English Sentences: Of the tribe of Zabulon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Joseph were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaabiloona zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Yooseefa zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa, Biniyaama zariyaappe tammanne naa77u sha7aa som77uwan maatafai wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, zare ubbaappe, qommo ubbaappe, yara ubbaappenne dumma dumma biitta qaala ubbaappe ooninne qoodanau danddayenna zawai bainna daro asaa taani be7aas. He asai bootta maayuwaa maayidi, zambbaa haittaa ba kushiyan oiqqidi, kawotaa araataa sinttaaninne Dorssaa sinttan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Nu atotettaikka kawotaa araatan uttida nu Xoossaappenne Dorssaappe yees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And all the angels stood round about the throne, and about the elders and the four beasts, and fell before the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchati ubbai kawotaa araataa, cimatanne paxa de7iya oiddu meretata yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidosona. Eti kawotaa araataa sinttan bantta som77uwan gufannidi Xoossaayyo goinniiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Amin77i! Anjjoi, bonchchoi, aadhdhida eratettai, galatai, sabai, wolqqai, minotettai merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi nu Xoossaayyo gido. Amin77i!" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?
Wolaitta Sentences: Cimatuppe issoi tana, "Ha bootta maayuwaa maayida asati oonee? Eti auppe yiidonaa?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin taani, "Ta Godau, neeni eraasa" yaagaas. I tana hagaadan yaagiis; "Hageeti daro waayiyaa waayidi yiidaageeta. Eti bantta maayuwaa Dorssaa suuttan meeccidi booxissidaageeta.

English Sentences: Therefore are they before the throne of God, and serve him day and night in his temple: and he that sitteth on the throne shall dwell among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti Xoossaa kawotaa araataa sinttan eqqidi, qamminne gallassi a Beeta Maqidasiyan ayyo oottoosona. Qassi i ba kawotaa araatan uttidaagee eta gidduwan de7ana.

English Sentences: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe sinttanau mulekka eti namisettokkona woi saamettokkona. Awai eta meenna; qassi ai mishoikka eta xuuggenna.

English Sentences: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, kawotaa araataayyo gidduwan uttida Dorssai eta heemmana. De7o haattaa pulttuwaakkokka eta kaalettana. Xoossaikka eta aifiyaappe afutta ubbaa quccirggana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven about the space of half an hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssai laappuntta maatafaa dooyido wode, bagga saate gidiyaagaa keenaa saloi sirphphi giis.

English Sentences: And I saw the seven angels which stood before God; and to them were given seven trumpets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani laappun kiitanchchata Xoossaa sinttan eqqiyaageeta be7aas; etayyo laappun malkkatai imettiis.

English Sentences: And another angel came and stood at the altar, having a golden censer; and there was given unto him much incense, that he should offer it with the prayers of all saints upon the golden altar which was before the throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ixaanaa cuwayiyo worqqa miishshaa oiqqida hara kiitanchchai yiidi, yarshshiyoosaa matan eqqiis. Worqqaappe merettida yarshshiyoosai kawotaa araataa sinttan de7ees; he yarshshiyoosaa bolli geeshsha ubbatu woosaa gujjana mala, kiitanchchaayyo daro ixaanai imettiis.

English Sentences: And the smoke of the incense, which came with the prayers of the saints, ascended up before God out of the angel's hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ixaanaa cuwai geeshshatu woosaara issippe he kiitanchchaa kushiyaappe pude Xoossaakko biis.

English Sentences: And the angel took the censer, and filled it with fire of the altar, and cast it into the earth: and there were voices, and thunderings, and lightnings, and an earthquake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, kiitanchchai ixaanaa cuwayiyoogaa ekkidi, yarshshiyoosaappe tamaa bonqquwaa ekkidi, aani kunttiis. Kunttidi, he ixaanaa cuwayiyoogaa duge sa7aa olin, dadai xuuqqiis. Wolqqanttai wolqqammiis; qassi biittaikka qaaxxiis.

English Sentences: And the seven angels which had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi laappun malkkataa oiqqida laappun kiitanchchati malkkataa punnanau giigettidosona.

English Sentences: The first angel sounded, and there followed hail and fire mingled with blood, and they were cast upon the earth: and the third part of trees was burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniis. Punnin suuttaara walakettida shachchainne tamai sa7an bukkiis. Sa7aappe heezzantto kushee xuugettiis; mittaappekka heezzantto kushee xuugettiis; maata ubbaikka xuugettiis.

English Sentences: And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto kiitanchchaikka ba malkkataa punniis. Wolqqaama dere milatiyaabai taman eexxiiddi, abban yegettiis; yaatin, abbaappe heezzantto kushee suutta gidiis.

English Sentences: And the third part of the creatures which were in the sea, and had life, died; and the third part of the ships were destroyed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abban paxa de7iya meretatuppe heezzantto kushee haiqqiis; markkabetuppekka heezzantto kushee xayiis.

English Sentences: And the third angel sounded, and there fell a great star from heaven, burning as it were a lamp, and it fell upon the third part of the rivers, and upon the fountains of waters;
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzantto kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniis; punnin shaafaappenne pultto haattaappe heezzantto kushiyaa bolli saluwaappe xomppedan eexxiya wolqqaama xoolinttee wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And the name of the star is called Wormwood: and the third part of the waters became wormwood; and many men died of the waters, because they were made bitter.
Wolaitta Sentences: He xoolinttiyaa sunttai Camuwaa geetettees. Haattaappe heezzantto kushee cammiis; qassi haattai cammido gishshau, daro asai he haattaa uyidi haiqqiis.

English Sentences: And the fourth angel sounded, and the third part of the sun was smitten, and the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars; so as the third part of them was darkened, and the day shone not for a third part of it, and the night likewise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oiddantto kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniis. Awaappe, aginaappenne xoolinttiyaappe heezzantto kushee deshettiis; eta poo7uwaappekka heezzantto kushee xumiis. Hegaa gishshau, gallassaappe heezzantto kushee, qammaappekka heezzantto kushee xumiis.

English Sentences: And I beheld, and heard an angel flying through the midst of heaven, saying with a loud voice, Woe, woe, woe, to the inhabiters of the earth by reason of the other voices of the trumpet of the three angels, which are yet to sound!
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi argganttai saluwaa pude haakkidi paalliyaagaa taani be7aas. He argganttai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Heezzu kiitanchchati punnana bessiyo hinkko malkkatai punettiyo wode, sa7an de7iya asau aayye7ana! Aayye7ana! Aayye7ana!" yaagiyoogaa siyaas.

English Sentences: And the fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star fall from heaven unto the earth: and to him was given the key of the bottomless pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, ichchashantto kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniis; punnin saluwaappe duge sa7aa kunddida xoolinttiyaa be7aas. He xoolinttiyaayyo ciimma ollaa qulppee imettiis.

English Sentences: And he opened the bottomless pit; and there arose a smoke out of the pit, as the smoke of a great furnace; and the sun and the air were darkened by reason of the smoke of the pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoolinttee ciimma ollaa dooyiis; aaho coociyaappe kiyiya cuwaa mala cuwai he ciimma ollaappe kiyiis. Qassi awainne carkkoi he ciimma ollaappe kiyida cuwan xumidosona.

English Sentences: And there came out of the smoke locusts upon the earth: and unto them was given power, as the scorpions of the earth have power.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cuwaappe boolee duge sa7aa yiis. Sa7an de7iya kalamasotuyyo de7iya wolqqaa mala wolqqai booliyaukka imettiis.

English Sentences: And it was commanded them that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree; but only those men which have not the seal of God in their foreheads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa maatafai som77uwan bainna asa xalaalaa qohanaappe attin, sa7an de7iya maataa woi aaciya mitta gidin woi ai mitta gidinkka qohenna mala, booliyau odettiis.

English Sentences: And to them it was given that they should not kill them, but that they should be tormented five months: and their torment was as the torment of a scorpion, when he striketh a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Boolee he asaa ichchashu agina gidiyaagaa paxa kaa7ana mala, maatai imettidoogaappe attin, ayyo asa woranau maati imettibeenna. Kalamasoi asa dukkidi seelissiyoogaa keenaa boolee seelissees.

English Sentences: And in those days shall men seek death, and shall not find it; and shall desire to die, and death shall flee from them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassatun asai haiquwaa koyana; shin demmenna. Qassi haiqqanaukka amottana; shin haiqoi asaappe baqatana.

English Sentences: And the shapes of the locusts were like unto horses prepared unto battle; and on their heads were as it were crowns like gold, and their faces were as the faces of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Boolee olau giigi uttida para milatees. Booliyaa huuphiyan worqqa milatiya akiliilee de7ees; a som77oikka asa som77o milatees.

English Sentences: And they had hair as the hair of women, and their teeth were as the teeth of lions.
Wolaitta Sentences: A binnaanaikka maccaasa binnaanaa milatees; a achchaikka gaammo achcha milatees.

English Sentences: And they had breastplates, as it were breastplates of iron; and the sound of their wings was as the sound of chariots of many horses running to battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: A tirai biratan oottido gonddalle milatiyaaban goozetti uttiis; qassi a qefiyaa cenggurssai olaa baanau piriixiya parati goochchiyo gaariyaa cenggurssaa mala.

English Sentences: And they had tails like unto scorpions, and there were stings in their tails: and their power was to hurt men five months.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ayyo kalamaso goina milatiya goinai de7ees; a goinan dukkiyaabai de7ees. He goinan ichchashu agina gidiyaagaa asa qohanaadan, ayyo maatai imettiis.

English Sentences: And they had a king over them, which is the angel of the bottomless pit, whose name in the Hebrew tongue is Abaddon, but in the Greek tongue hath his name Apollyon.
Wolaitta Sentences: A haariya kawoi de7ees. He kawoi ciimma ollaa kiitanchcha. A sunttaikka Ibraisxxe qaalan Abddoona; qassi Giriike qaalan Apholiyoona geetettees. Apholiyoona giyoogau birshshettai, xaissiyaagaa giyoogaa.

English Sentences: One woe is past; and, behold, there come two woes more hereafter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koiro aayye7ana giyoogee aadhdhiis; be7a, biron hara naa77u aayye7ana giyoogee yaana.

English Sentences: And the sixth angel sounded, and I heard a voice from the four horns of the golden altar which is before God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Usuppuntta kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniis. Xoossaa sinttan eqqida, worqqaappe medhdhido yarshshiyoosan de7iya oiddu kacetuppe issi cenggurssaa siyaas.

English Sentences: Saying to the sixth angel which had the trumpet, Loose the four angels which are bound in the great river Euphrates.
Wolaitta Sentences: He cenggurssai malkkatai de7iyo usuppuntta kiitanchchaa, "Efiraaxiisa giyo wogga shaafan qashettida oiddu kiitanchchata birshsha" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the four angels were loosed, which were prepared for an hour, and a day, and a month, and a year, for to slay the third part of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin asa zariyaappe heezzantto kushiyaa woranau, ha saatiyaassi, gallassaassi, aginaassinne laittaassi giigissi wottido, oiddu kiitanchchati birshshettidosona.

English Sentences: And the number of the army of the horsemen were two hundred thousand thousand: and I heard the number of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olaa paraa toggiya asaa paidoi naa77u xeetu miiloone gidiyoogaa taani siyaas.

English Sentences: And thus I saw the horses in the vision, and them that sat on them, having breastplates of fire, and of jacinth, and brimstone: and the heads of the horses were as the heads of lions; and out of their mouths issued fire and smoke and brimstone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka taani ajjuutan paratanne he parata toggida asaa be7aas. Asaayyo tiran wottiyo birata gonddalle malai de7ees. He tiran wottiyo birata gonddalle malai tamadan zo7o; saluwaa mala; qassi dinniyaa mala. Paratu huuphee gaammo huuphe mala. Eta doonaappe tamai, cuwainne dinnee kiyiis.

English Sentences: By these three was the third part of men killed, by the fire, and by the smoke, and by the brimstone, which issued out of their mouths.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paratu doonaappe kiyida taman, cuwaaninne dinniyan ha heezzu boshatun asa zariyaappe heezzantto kushee haiqqiis.

English Sentences: For their power is in their mouth, and in their tails: for their tails were like unto serpents, and had heads, and with them they do hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, paratuyyo wolqqai doonaaninne goinan de7ees. Eta goinaikka huuphiyaara de7iya shooshsha milatees; hegan eti asa qohoosona.

English Sentences: And the rest of the men which were not killed by these plagues yet repented not of the works of their hands, that they should not worship devils, and idols of gold, and silver, and brass, and stone, and of wood: which neither can see, nor hear, nor walk:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha boshatun haiqqennan attida asai ba kushiyan oottidobaa aggibeenna. Qassi worqqaappe, biraappe, nahaase giyo birataappenne shuchchaappe oosettida, xeellanau woi siyanau woi hemettanau danddayenna eeqaassinne xalahiyaassi goinniyoogaakka aggibeenna.

English Sentences: Neither repented they of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their fornication, nor of their thefts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ba woridoogaa, woi ba bitidoogaa, woi ba shaaramuxidoogaa, woi ba wuuqqidoogaa aggidi, ba nagaraappe simmibeenna.

English Sentences: And I saw another mighty angel come down from heaven, clothed with a cloud: and a rainbow was upon his head, and his face was as it were the sun, and his feet as pillars of fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka taani hara wolqqaama kiitanchchai saluwaappe kiyidi, duge wodhdhiyaagaa be7aas. SHaaraa i maayi uttiis; qassi zuullai a huuphiyaa yuuyi aadhdhi uttiis. A som77oikka awa mala; a tohoikka tama tuussa mala.

English Sentences: And he had in his hand a little book open: and he set his right foot upon the sea, and his left foot on the earth,
Wolaitta Sentences: He kiitanchchai dooya de7iya issi guutta xaatta woraqatiyo ba kushiyan oiqqidi uttiis. Ba ushachcha tohuwaa abbaa bolli essidi, ba haddirssa tohuwaa biittaa bolli essiis.

English Sentences: And cried with a loud voice, as when a lion roareth: and when he had cried, seven thunders uttered their voices.
Wolaitta Sentences: Essidi gudiya gaammuwaadan, wolqqappe gudiis. I gudidoogaappe guyyiyan, laappun dadati aara gunttan haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And when the seven thunders had uttered their voices, I was about to write: and I heard a voice from heaven saying unto me, Seal up those things which the seven thunders uttered, and write them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti guummido wode taani xaafanau qoppaas. SHin saluwaappe, "Laappun dadati haasayidobaa asau qaattoppanne xaafoppa" yaagiya cenggurssai tau siyettiis.

English Sentences: And the angel which I saw stand upon the sea and upon the earth lifted up his hand to heaven,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, abbaa bollaaninne biittaa bollan eqqidaashin taani be7ido kiitanchchai, ba ushachcha kushiyaa saluwaa pude micciis.

English Sentences: And sware by him that liveth for ever and ever, who created heaven, and the things that therein are, and the earth, and the things that therein are, and the sea, and the things which are therein, that there should be time no longer:
Wolaitta Sentences: Miccidi, saluwaanne saluwan de7iya ubbabaa, sa7aanne sa7an de7iya ubbabaa, abbaanne abban de7iya ubbabaa, medhdhida meri merinau de7iya Xoossaa sunttan caaqqiis. Yaatidi, "Wodee wuranau gam77enna.

English Sentences: But in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he shall begin to sound, the mystery of God should be finished, as he hath declared to his servants the prophets.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin laappuntta kiitanchchai ba malkkataa punniyo wode, Xoossai hananabaa yootiya ba ashkkaratuyyo qaalaa yooti wottidoogaadankka, i xuurido xuurai polettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the voice which I heard from heaven spake unto me again, and said, Go and take the little book which is open in the hand of the angel which standeth upon the sea and upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, saluwaappe haasayishin taani siyido cenggurssai naa77anttuwaa zaaridi tana, "Abbaa bollaaninne biittaa bollan eqqida kiitanchchaa kushiyan dooya de7iya xaatta woraqatiyo baada ekka" yaagishin siyaas.

English Sentences: And I went unto the angel, and said unto him, Give me the little book. And he said unto me, Take it, and eat it up; and it shall make thy belly bitter, but it shall be in thy mouth sweet as honey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he kiitanchchaakko baada, guutta xaatta woraqatiyo taayyo immana mala, a oichchaas. I tana, "Ekkada ma; woraqatiyaa ne uluwaa camettana; shin ne doonan eessadan, a mal77ana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And I took the little book out of the angel's hand, and ate it up; and it was in my mouth sweet as honey: and as soon as I had eaten it, my belly was bitter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin, taani kiitanchchaa kushiyaappe he guutta xaatta woraqatiyo ekkada maas; ta doonan woraqatiyaa eessadan mal77aasu. SHin taani miidoogaappe guyyiyan, ta ulo giddoi cammiis.

English Sentences: And he said unto me, Thou must prophesy again before many peoples, and nations, and tongues, and kings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka tana, "Yara ubbaabaa, zare ubbaabaa, dumma dumma biittaa qaalaabaanne kawotubaa neeni hananabaa naa77anttuwaa haasayanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And there was given me a reed like unto a rod: and the angel stood, saying, Rise, and measure the temple of God, and the altar, and them that worship therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, shombboqo milatiya likkiyo xam77ai taassi imettiis. Imettin tana giidoogee hagaa; "Baada Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaanne yarshshiyoosaa likka. Hegan goinniyaageetakka paida.

English Sentences: But the court which is without the temple leave out, and measure it not; for it is given unto the Gentiles: and the holy city shall they tread under foot forty and two months.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Beeta Maqidasiyau kare baggaa agga baya; hegaa likkoppa. Aissi giikko, he sohoi Aihuda gidenna asau imettiis. Aihuda gidenna asai geeshsha katamaa oitamanne naa77u aginau yedhdhana.

English Sentences: And I will give power unto my two witnesses, and they shall prophesy a thousand two hundred and threescore days, clothed in sackcloth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani waaruwaa maayida ta naa77u markkata kiittana; eti issi sha7anne naa77u xeetanne usuppun tammu gallassan Xoossaa kiitaa yootana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: These are the two olive trees, and the two candlesticks standing before the God of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77u markkati ha sa7aa Godaa sinttan eqqiya naa77u wogaratanne xomppiyaa wottiyo naa77u ballata.

English Sentences: And if any man will hurt them, fire proceedeth out of their mouth, and devoureth their enemies: and if any man will hurt them, he must in this manner be killed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne eta qohanau koyikko, eta doonaappe tamai kiyees; kiyidi eta morkketakka xaissees. Qassi ooninne eta qohanau koyikko, hegaadankka haiqqana.

English Sentences: These have power to shut heaven, that it rain not in the days of their prophecy: and have power over waters to turn them to blood, and to smite the earth with all plagues, as often as they will.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa kiitaa yootiyo wodiyan irai bukkennaadan, saluwaa gorddanau etayyo maatai de7ees. Etau haattaa suutta kessiyo maataikka de7ees; qassi eti banttana koshshiyo wode, sa7aa dumma dumma boshan dechchanau etayyo maatai de7ees.

English Sentences: And when they shall have finished their testimony, the beast that ascendeth out of the bottomless pit shall make war against them, and shall overcome them, and kill them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta markkatettaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, ciimma ollaappe pude kiyiya do7ai etaara olettana. He do7ai eta xoonidi worana.

English Sentences: And their dead bodies shall lie in the street of the great city, which spiritually is called Sodom and Egypt, where also our Lord was crucified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta Godai masqqaliyaa bollan misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettido katamaa wogga ogiyan eta ahai zin77ana. He katamai leemisuwan Sadooma woi Gibxxe geetettidi xeesettees.

English Sentences: And they of the people and kindreds and tongues and nations shall see their dead bodies three days and an half, and shall not suffer their dead bodies to be put in graves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi yara ubbaappe, qommo ubbaappe, dumma dumma biittaa qaalaappenne zare ubbaappe yiida asai eta ahaa heezzu gallassanne baggaa be7ana. Ahai moogettenna mala, he asai diggana.

English Sentences: And they that dwell upon the earth shall rejoice over them, and make merry, and shall send gifts one to another; because these two prophets tormented them that dwelt on the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asai ha hananabaa yootiya naa77u asatu haiquwan ufaittana. Asai eta haiquwaa Masqqaladan bonchchana; issoi issuwaayyo immiyoobaakka kiittana. Aissi giikko, sa7an de7iya asaa eti daro metoyidosona.

English Sentences: And after three days and an half the Spirit of life from God entered into them, and they stood upon their feet; and great fear fell upon them which saw them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzu gallassaappenne baggaappe guyyiyan, de7o ayyaanai Xoossaa matappe yiidi, etan geliis; gelin eti denddi eqqidosona. Eta be7ida ubbai iita yashsha yayyiis.

English Sentences: And they heard a great voice from heaven saying unto them, Come up hither. And they ascended up to heaven in a cloud; and their enemies beheld them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, he hananabaa yootiya naa77u asati saluwaappe, "Haa pude kiyite" giya wolqqaama cenggurssaa siyidosona. Bantta morkketi banttana xeellishin, eti shaaran gelidi, pude saluwaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And the same hour was there a great earthquake, and the tenth part of the city fell, and in the earthquake were slain of men seven thousand: and the remnant were affrighted, and gave glory to the God of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: He saatiyan biittai wolqqappe qaaxxiis; qaaxxin katamaappe tammantta kushee xayiis. Qassi biittaa qaattan laappun sha7u asai haiqqiis. Haiqqennan attida asai keehi kokkori yayyidi, saluwaa Xoossaa gitatettaa sabbiis.

English Sentences: The second woe is past; and, behold, the third woe cometh quickly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto aayye7ana giyoogee aadhdhiis. SHin akeekite; heezzantto aayye7ana giyoogee eesuwan yaana.

English Sentences: And the seventh angel sounded; and there were great voices in heaven, saying, The kingdoms of this world are become the kingdoms of our Lord, and of his Christ; and he shall reign for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, laappuntta kiitanchchaikka ba malkkataa punniis. Saluwan, "Sa7aa kawotettai ha77i nu Godaassanne a Kiristtoosassa; qassi merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi i haarana" yaagiya wolqqaama cenggurssai siyettiis.

English Sentences: And the four and twenty elders, which sat before God on their seats, fell upon their faces, and worshipped God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyettin bantta araatan uttida laatamanne oiddu cimati Xoossaa sinttan duge gufannidi, Xoossaayyo goinniiddi hagaadan yaagidosona;

English Sentences: Saying, We give thee thanks, O LORD God Almighty, which art, and wast, and art to come; because thou hast taken to thee thy great power, and hast reigned.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77i de7iyaagoo, kaseesappekka de7iyaagoo, Godau, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossau, neeyyo gita wolqqai de7iyo gishshaunne neeni haaranau doommido gishshau, nuuni nena galatoos.

English Sentences: And the nations were angry, and thy wrath is come, and the time of the dead, that they should be judged, and that thou shouldest give reward unto thy servants the prophets, and to the saints, and them that fear thy name, small and great; and shouldest destroy them which destroy the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda gidenna asai hanqqettiis; ne hanqqoikka gakkiis. Haiqqidaageeti pirddettiyo wodee ha77a; qassi neeni ne ashkkaratuyyo, hananabaa yootiyaageetuyyo, geeshshatuyyo, ne sunttau yayyiyaageetuyyo, xoqqatuyyoonne ziqqatuyyo eta oosuwaadan immiyo wodeekka ha77a. Sa7aa xaissiyaageetakka neeni xaissiyo wodee ha77a" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the temple of God was opened in heaven, and there was seen in his temple the ark of his testament: and there were lightnings, and voices, and thunderings, and an earthquake, and great hail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan de7iya Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasee dooyettiis; a Beeta Maqidasiyan Xoossaa Maachchaa Taabootai beettiis. Qassi wolqqanttai wolqqammiis; gunttai siyettiis; dadai xuuqqiis; biittai qaaxxiis; shachchaikka shacciis.

English Sentences: And there appeared a great wonder in heaven; a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and upon her head a crown of twelve stars:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, saluwan wolqqaama malaatai beettiis. Awaa maayida issi mishiriyaa, aginaa bolli eqqidaara, tammanne naa77u xoolintte akiliiliyaa ba huuphiyan wottidaara hegan de7ausu.

English Sentences: And she being with child cried, travailing in birth, and pained to be delivered.
Wolaitta Sentences: He mishiriyaa shahaara; o maaretai oiqqidi, leessoi un77ettin waassaasu.

English Sentences: And there appeared another wonder in heaven; and behold a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and seven crowns upon his heads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara issi wolqqaama malaatai saluwan beettiis. Tammu kaciyaara de7iya laappun huuphiyan akiliiliyaa wottida issi gita zo7o miimminttee de7ees.

English Sentences: And his tail drew the third part of the stars of heaven, and did cast them to the earth: and the dragon stood before the woman which was ready to be delivered, for to devour her child as soon as it was born.
Wolaitta Sentences: He miimminttee ba goinan heezzantto kushe xoolinttiyaa saluwaappe dafidi, sa7an oliis. He miimminttee yeletti wodhdhosaarakka na7aa mi bayanau yelana haniya maccaasee sinttan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And she brought forth a man child, who was to rule all nations with a rod of iron: and her child was caught up unto God, and to his throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyaa attuma na7aa, Aihuda gidenna asaa ubbaa birata xam77an haaranaagaa yelaasu. SHin na7ai Xoossaakkonne a araataakko, pude eesuwan ehettiis.

English Sentences: And the woman fled into the wilderness, where she hath a place prepared of God, that they should feed her there a thousand two hundred and threescore days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ehettin mishiriyaa issi sha7anne naa77u xeetanne usuppun tammu gallassau miziiddinne ushshiiddi wottanau Xoossai giigissi wottido sohuwaa bazzuwaa baqataasu.

English Sentences: And there was war in heaven: Michael and his angels fought against the dragon; and the dragon fought and his angels,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, saluwan olai denddiis. Mikaa7eeli ba kiitanchchatuura issippe miimminttiyaara olettiis; miimmintteekka ba kiitanchchatuura gididi, zaarettidi olettiis.

English Sentences: And prevailed not; neither was their place found any more in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin miimminttee xoonettiis. Xoonettin miimminttiyaassinne a kiitanchchatussi saluwan sohoi xayiis.

English Sentences: And the great dragon was cast out, that old serpent, called the Devil, and Satan, which deceiveth the whole world: he was cast out into the earth, and his angels were cast out with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita miimminttee, xalahe halaqaa woikko Seexaanaa giyoogee, beni shooshshai, sa7a ubbaa balettiyaagee olettiis; i ba kiitanchchatuura issippe duge sa7au olettiis.

English Sentences: And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, taani saluwaappe hagaadan yaagiya cenggurssaa siyaas; "Xoossaa atotettai ha77i yiis. Xoossai bau Kawo gidiyoogaadankka ba wolqqaa bessiis; a Kiristtoosi ba maataa bessiis. Aissi giikko, qamminne gallassi Xoossaa sinttan eqqidi, nu ishantta mootiyaagee saluwaappe duge olettiis.

English Sentences: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu ishantti Dorssaa suuttaaninne bantta tumu markkatettan miimminttiyaara olettidi xoonidosona. Qassi eti bantta shemppuwaa aatti immiyoogau qarettibookkona.

English Sentences: Therefore rejoice, ye heavens, and ye that dwell in them. Woe to the inhabiters of the earth and of the sea! for the devil is come down unto you, having great wrath, because he knoweth that he hath but a short time.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, saluwaunne salo giddon de7iyaageetoo, ufaittite. SHin sa7aunne abbau aayye7ana! Aissi giikko, xalahe halaqai baayyo guutta wodee attidoogaa eriyo gishshau, wolqqaama hanqquwaara duge inttekko wodhdhiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the dragon saw that he was cast unto the earth, he persecuted the woman which brought forth the man child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi miimminttee bana duge sa7aa olidoogaa be7idoogaappe guyyiyan, he attuma na7aa yelida mishiriyo yedetaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And to the woman were given two wings of a great eagle, that she might fly into the wilderness, into her place, where she is nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishiriyo shooshshai qohenna mala, heezzu laittaanne baggaa maiddanne uyaidda a naagettiyoosaa bazzo paallada baana mala, naa77u wolqqaama argganttaa qefee iyyo imettiis.

English Sentences: And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, mishiriyo di7oi di77idi efaana mala, shooshshai shaafaa haattaa keena haattaa ba doonaappe mishiree geeduwan gussiis.

English Sentences: And the earth helped the woman, and the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed up the flood which the dragon cast out of his mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin biittai mishiriyo maaddiis; biittai ba doonaa dooyidi, miimminttiyaa doonaappe kiyida haattaa mitti aggiis.

English Sentences: And the dragon was wroth with the woman, and went to make war with the remnant of her seed, which keep the commandments of God, and have the testimony of Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Miimminttee mishireeyyo daro hanqqettiis; hanqqettidi, i zareta Xoossaa azazuwaa naagiya ubbatanne Yesuusi qonccissido tumaayyo ammanettiyaageeta olanau biis. Biidi abbaa doonan de7iya shafiyan eqqiis.

English Sentences: And I stood upon the sand of the sea, and saw a beast rise up out of the sea, having seven heads and ten horns, and upon his horns ten crowns, and upon his heads the name of blasphemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, issi do7ai abbaappe kiyishin, taani be7aas. Ayyo tammu kaceenne laappun huuphee de7ees; a tammu kaciyaa bollan tammu akiliilee de7ees. A huuphiyankka cashshaa sunttai xaafetti uttiis.

English Sentences: And the beast which I saw was like unto a leopard, and his feet were as the feet of a bear, and his mouth as the mouth of a lion: and the dragon gave him his power, and his seat, and great authority.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani be7ido do7ai maahe milatees; a tohoi beeriyaa giyo iita do7aa tohuwaa milatees; a doonai gaammo doona milatees. Miimminttee ba wolqqaa, ba araataanne ba gita maataa he do7aayyo immiis.

English Sentences: And I saw one of his heads as it were wounded to death; and his deadly wound was healed: and all the world wondered after the beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: He do7aa huuphetuppe issoi haiqqidabaa milatiyaagaa taani be7aas; shin woriya masunttai paxiis. Sa7aa asai ubbai garamettidi, he do7aa geeduwaa kaalliis.

English Sentences: And they worshipped the dragon which gave power unto the beast: and they worshipped the beast, saying, Who is like unto the beast? who is able to make war with him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Miimminttee ba maataa do7aayyo immido gishshau, asai ubbai miimminttiyaayyo goinniis. Qassi he asai, "Do7aa malai oonee? Aara olettanau ooni danddayii?" yaagiiddi, do7aayyo goinniis.

English Sentences: And there was given unto him a mouth speaking great things and blasphemies; and power was given unto him to continue forty and two months.
Wolaitta Sentences: He do7aayyo pala yohuwaanne cashshaa haasayiyo doonai imettiis. Oitamanne naa77u aginaayyo oottana mala, ayyo maatai imettiis.

English Sentences: And he opened his mouth in blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his tabernacle, and them that dwell in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: He do7ai Xoossaa, a sunttaa, i de7iyoosaanne saluwan de7iya ubbata qanggettaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: He do7ai geeshshatuura olettidi, eta xoonana mala, ayyo maatai imettiis. Qommo ubbaa, yara ubbaa, dumma dumma biitta qaala ubbaanne zare ubbaa haariyo maatai ayyo imettiis.

English Sentences: And all that dwell upon the earth shall worship him, whose names are not written in the book of life of the Lamb slain from the foundation of the world.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai merettanaappe kase shuhettida Dorssaa de7o maxaafan sunttai xaafettibeenna asai, sa7an de7iyaagee ubbai, he do7aayyo goinnana.

English Sentences: If any man have an ear, let him hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyiya haitti de7iyo urai siyo.

English Sentences: He that leadeth into captivity shall go into captivity: he that killeth with the sword must be killed with the sword. Here is the patience and the faith of the saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omoodettana asi de7ikko, ooninne omoodettana. Bisuwan shuhettana asi de7ikko, ooninne bisuwan shuhettana. Geeshshatu danddayainne ammanoi hagan erettana.

English Sentences: And I beheld another beast coming up out of the earth; and he had two horns like a lamb, and he spake as a dragon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hara do7ai sa7aappe kiyiyaagaa taani be7aas. Dorssa kace milatiya naa77u kacee ayyo de7ees; qassi he do7ai miimminttiyaadan haasayiis.

English Sentences: And he exerciseth all the power of the first beast before him, and causeth the earth and them which dwell therein to worship the first beast, whose deadly wound was healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He do7ai koiro do7aa gita maataa ubbaa a sinttan oottiis. Sa7ainne sa7an de7iya asai ubbai woriya masunttai paxido koiro do7aayyo goinnana mala, he do7ai godatiis.

English Sentences: And he doeth great wonders, so that he maketh fire come down from heaven on the earth in the sight of men,
Wolaitta Sentences: He naa77antto do7ai gita malaatata oottiis; harai atto tamaa saluwaappe asa ubbaa sintti sa7aa wottana gakkanaassi malaatata oottiis.
